mean_cn: adj.保守的；保守估计的；保守党的；  n.保守者；保守党党员
mean_en: opposed to great or sudden social change; showing that you prefer traditional styles and values
sentence: The man has such a conservative attitude; he even despises the couple holding hands.
sentence_trans: 这个人的态度如此保守，就连情侣牵手他都看不惯。
word_etyma: conserv保留 + a + tive形容词后缀 → conservative保守的
